org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.dao

Interface ExternalCallDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalCallDaoJpaImpl

    public interface ExternalCallDao
    DAO for ExternalCall entity.
    Author:
    Petr Juza

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExternalCall findConfirmation(int interval)
      Finds ONE confirmation in state ExternalCallStateEnum.FAILED.
      List<ExternalCall> findProcessingExternalCalls(int interval)
      Finds "processing" external calls in specified interval.
      ExternalCall getExternalCall(String operationName, String entityId)
      Finds an existing external call for the specified operation and entityId.
      void insert(ExternalCall externalCall)
      Inserts new call.
      ExternalCall lockConfirmation(ExternalCall extCall)
      Updates confirmation (set state to PROCESSING) - gets lock for this confirmation.
      void lockExternalCall(ExternalCall extCall)
      Updates the specified attached external call entity to start processing a new external call (set state to PROCESSING).
      void update(ExternalCall externalCall)
      Updates call.

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        void insert(ExternalCall externalCall)
        Inserts new call.
        Parameters:
        externalCall - the external call

      • update

        void update(ExternalCall externalCall)
        Updates call.
        Parameters:
        externalCall - the external call

      • getExternalCall

        @Nullable
ExternalCall getExternalCall(String operationName,
                                    String entityId)
        Finds an existing external call for the specified operation and entityId.
        Parameters:
        operationName - the operation name (uri) to find the call for
        entityId - the entity id (operation key) to find the call for
        Returns:
        the found external call or null, if no such call is registered

      • lockExternalCall

        void lockExternalCall(ExternalCall extCall)
                      throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
        Updates the specified attached external call entity to start processing a new external call (set state to PROCESSING).
        Parameters:
        extCall - the external call that is attached to local EntityManager (e.g., acquired via getExternalCall(String, String) in the same transaction)
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.PersistenceException - e.g., if the lock fails

      • findConfirmation

        @Nullable
ExternalCall findConfirmation(int interval)
        Finds ONE confirmation in state ExternalCallStateEnum.FAILED.
        Parameters:
        interval - Interval (in seconds) between two tries of failed confirmations.
        Returns:
        external call or null if there is no any confirmation

      • lockConfirmation

        ExternalCall lockConfirmation(ExternalCall extCall)
        Updates confirmation (set state to PROCESSING) - gets lock for this confirmation.
        Parameters:
        extCall - the external call
        Returns:
        the locked external call, if lock is successful; throws an exception, if the lock failed
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.PersistenceException - e.g., if the lock fails

      • findProcessingExternalCalls

        List<ExternalCall> findProcessingExternalCalls(int interval)
        Finds "processing" external calls in specified interval.
        Parameters:
        interval - the interval
        Returns:
        list of calls
